title: whistler village twitch
body: i was lucky enough to get this skin in hextech crafting, oh was i excited, a twitch player to get a rare skin, i noticed the splash art to have a propeller hat, i was thrilled, but in game the skin did not have a hat, rito i would be sincerly happy if you gave twitch his propeller hat please :D{{champion:29}}

replies.body: It was better before the re-make... :^(
